description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=3/3, Mature Content=0/3. GREETINGS HUMANOID!  Re-live the classic Commissar 6000 game on your XBox 360! 40 levels of pulse-pounding, monster-shooting, maze-racing, 8-bit action!
description.short: GREETINGS HUMANOID!  Re-live the classic Commissar 6000 game on your XBox 360! 40 levels of pulse-pounding, monster-shooting, maze-racing, 8-bit action!
